description: Table for precomputed harsh event counts

schema.name: org_id
schema.description: This Internal ID for the customer's Samsara Org

schema.name: object_id
schema.description: The driver_id or the device_id depending on the object_type

schema.name: object_type
schema.description: 1 = device, 5 = driver

schema.name: interval_start
schema.description: The hourly start interval corresponding to the trip end

schema.name: other_harsh_event_count
schema.description: Dummy field set to zero

schema.name: acceleration_count
schema.description: Count of harsh acceleration events during the trip

schema.name: braking_count
schema.description: Count of harsh braking events during the trip

schema.name: harsh_turn_count
schema.description: Count of harsh turn events during the trip

schema.name: crash_count
schema.description: Count of crash events during the trip

schema.name: rolling_stop_count
schema.description: Count of rolking stop events during the trip

schema.name: rollover_protection_count
schema.description: Count of rollover protection events during the trip

schema.name: yaw_control_count
schema.description: Count of yaw control events during the trip

schema.name: harsh_event_trigger_count
schema.description: Count of harsh events excluding ADAS events during the trip

schema.name: edge_distracted_driving_count
schema.description: Count of edge (real time camera analysis) distracted driving events during the trip

schema.name: edge_tailgating_count
schema.description: Count of edge (real time camera analysis) tailgating events during the trip

schema.name: edge_forward_collision_warning_count
schema.description: Count of edge (real time camera analysis) forward collision events during the trip

schema.name: generic_distraction_count
schema.description: Count of generic distraction events during the trip

schema.name: drowsy_count
schema.description: Count of drowsy events during the trip

schema.name: late_response_count
schema.description: Count of late response events during the trip

schema.name: mobile_usage_count
schema.description: Count of mobile usage events during the trip

schema.name: no_seat_belt_count
schema.description: Count of no seat belt events during the trip

schema.name: did_not_yield_count
schema.description: Count of did not yield events during the trip

schema.name: near_collision_count
schema.description: Count of near collision events during the trip

schema.name: ran_red_light_count
schema.description: Count of red light run events during the trip

schema.name: speeding_count
schema.description: Count of speeding events during the trip

schema.name: following_distance_severe_count
schema.description: Count of severe following distance events during the trip

schema.name: following_distance_moderate_count
schema.description: Count of moderate following distance events during the trip

schema.name: generic_tailgating_count
schema.description: Count of generic tailgating events during the trip

schema.name: defensive_driving_count
schema.description: Count of defensive driving events during the trip

schema.name: obstructed_camera_count
schema.description: Count of camera obstruction events during the trip

schema.name: lane_departure_count
schema.description: Count of lane departure events during the trip

schema.name: smoking_count
schema.description: Count of smoking events during the trip

schema.name: aggressive_driving_count
schema.description: Count of aggressive driving events during the trip

schema.name: eating_drinking_count
schema.description: Count of eating or drinking events during the trip

schema.name: inclement_weather_count
schema.description: Count of inclement weather events during the trip

schema.name: distance_meters
schema.description: Distance covered during the trip

schema.name: engine_idle_ms
schema.description: How long the engine was idle during the trip

schema.name: driving_time_ms
schema.description: Driving time for the trip

schema.name: seatbelt_reporting_present_ms
schema.description: How long the seatbelt reporting was present during the trip

schema.name: seatbelt_unbuckled_ms
schema.description: How long the seatbelt was unbuckled during the trip

schema.name: harsh_event_identifiers
schema.description: collection of event timestamps and the device_ids during the trip

schema.name: date
schema.description: The date corresponding to the interval when these counts were captured
